prayers.name: Spiritual Communion Prayer
prayers.text: As I cannot now receive Thee, my Jesus, in Holy Communion, come, spiritually into my heart, and make it Thine own forever.

prayers.name: Spiritual Communion Prayer
prayers.text: Cum Te, Iesu meus, nunc in Sancta Communione recipere non possim, veni spiritualiter in cor meum et fac illud Tuum in aeternum.

prayers.name: Invocation to the Blessed Sacrament
prayers.text: Jesus in the Blessed Sacrament on the altar have mercy on us!

prayers.name: Invocation to the Blessed Sacrament
prayers.text: Iesu in Sanctissimo Sacramento super altare, miserere nobis!
